title: Lot of Eleven Restaurant Advertising Baseball Postcards - Includes Jack Dempsey too.
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: Lot of Eleven Restaurant Advertising Baseball Postcards - Includes Jack Dempsey too.
posts.post_content: Lot of Eleven Restaurant Advertising Baseball Postcards - Includes Jack Dempsey too!.  Includes five linen postcard (C1940) and 6 chrome postcards (C1950+) $50.00 ppd for the lot.  PayPal F&F, check and money order.  Thank you.  Jim
